summary: Ignoring an ancient prophecy, evil brother Gregor seeks to maintain his feudal power on his his Tyrolean estate by murdering and impersonating his benevolent younger twin.
cast: Boris Karloff|Marian Marsh|Robert Allen|Thurston Hall|Katherine DeMille|John Buckler|Henry Kolker|Colin Tapley|Torben Meyer|John Beck|Daniel Joseph Bleifer|John Bleifer|Sidney Bracey|Egon Brecher|Carrie Daumery|Edwards Davis|Victor De Linsky|Abe Dinovitch|Von the Dog|Herbert Evans|Phyllis Fraser|John George|Octavio Giraud|Grace Goodall|James Gordon|Helena Grant|Bert Howard|Edith Kingdon|Richard Lancaster|Marion Lessing|Lois Lindsay|Ivan Linow|George Burr MacAnnan|Mary MacLaren|George MacQuarrie|Michael Mark|Eric Mayne|Alex Melesh|Louis Merrill|Robert Middlemass|Wilfrid North|Reinhold Pasch|Constantine Romanoff|John Singer|Bert Sprotte|Count Stefenelli|John M. Sullivan|Edward Van Sloan|Frederick Vogeding|Hans von Morhart|Paul Weigel
director: Director: Roy William Neill (as R. William Neill)
title: Horror en el cuarto negro
